Wowhead
Wowhead

The Lost Tools

Foreman Oslow of Lakeshire wants you to retrieve his toolbox from the bottom of Lake Everstill.
Oslow's Toolbox

Description

I could really use a hand here, <name>. With the town under siege, it's been hard to get supplies. My tools were being delivered from Goldshire by wagon but the bridge was blown out. We put the tools in a boat but the orcs hit it with a catapult. Just my luck, my toolbox sank right to the bottom of the lake.

Retrieve my toolbox, <name>, and I'll make it worth your while.

Reward

You will receive:
Medium Armor Kit

Progress

Were you able to find my tools?

Completion

Excellent recovery, <name>! I never thought I'd see these tools again.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 880 Experience
  • 75 Reputation with Stormwind
